title: Kaironauts: Unearthing Hidden Mysteries of the Twin Cities
description: In their talk "Kaironauts: Unearthing Hidden Mysteries of the Twin Cities", HKURBEX will delve into the shared issues of heritage, urban renewal, and gentrification, between Hong Kong and Singapore and the value of trespassing (via urban exploration). Can urban exploration lead to discourse in heritage preservation, urban renewal, gentrification? Sometimes, unconventional means are necessary to stimulate and provoke a wider conversation.
author: HKURBEX
